citation: Peer Training and Certification page – description of the Arkansas Peer Recovery Program (APRP)
administering_body: Office of Substance Abuse and Mental Health (OSAMH)
effects: OSAMH administers the Arkansas Peer Recovery Program, a three‑tier credentialing process (core, advanced, supervisor) designed to produce highly trained peer workers. The program is carried out with a DHS‑approved accrediting entity and is authorized by Ark. Code § 20‑64‑602(b)(19). Certification involves classroom education, on‑the‑job training and mentorship【702168819522465†L870-L882】.
